name: Tumblr - Tweak - Add Blockquotes Back
description: Displays dashboard with blockquotes similar to the old style.
css: @-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.tumblr.com"), url-prefix("https://www.tumblr.com") { .reblog-list-item .reblog-avatar, .reblog-list-item .reblog-avatar .reblog-avatar-image-thumb { display: none !important; } .reblog-list-item .reblog-header { padding-left: 0px !important; margin-bottom: 10px !important; line-height: 1 !important; } a.reblog-tumblelog-name.post_info_link { text-decoration: underline !important; } .reblog-list-item .reblog-header::after { content: ":" !important; margin-bottom: 5px !important; display: inline !important; font-weight: bold !important; } .reblog-list-item .reblog-tumblelog-deactivated-status { opacity: 1 !important; } .reblog-content { border-left: 2px solid #e7e7e7 !important; padding-left: 10px !important; margin-left: 5px !important; } .reblog-content p, .post .post_body p { margin-top: 10px !important; } figure { margin: 0px !important; } }
